values.content:
Enhance this 30-day content schedule with detailed content suggestions. For each post, provide:

1. Specific content idea
2. Compelling headline/title
3. Key points to cover
4. Visual description
5. Engagement hooks

Focus on {{ $('30-Day Schedule Engine').first().json.metadata.topic }} for {{ $('30-Day Schedule Engine').first().json.metadata.audience }}.

Schedule data:
{{ JSON.stringify($('30-Day Schedule Engine').first().json.schedule.slice(0, 7), null, 2) }}

Provide detailed suggestions for the first week (7 days) in this format:
Day X: [Specific content idea with headline and details]

Keep responses practical and actionable.

Create SEO-optimized hashtag sets for this 30-day content schedule.

Topic: {{ $('30-Day Schedule Engine').first().json.metadata.topic }}
Niche: {{ $('30-Day Schedule Engine').first().json.metadata.niche }}
Platforms: {{ $('30-Day Schedule Engine').first().json.metadata.platforms.join(', ') }}

Generate 5 hashtag sets for each platform that can be rotated throughout the month:

Format:
Platform - Set 1: #hashtag1 #hashtag2...
Platform - Set 2: #hashtag1 #hashtag2...

Focus on trauma healing, inner child work, and mental health awareness.
Include trending and niche-specific hashtags.
Optimize for discoverability and engagement.
